data.what_is:
Freshmarketer helps marketing teams deliver more personalized customer experiences at
every touchpoint across their lifecycle. Get insights into your audience's behavior and
engagement to create unique buyer experiences. You can automate conversations with
website visitors using AI chatbots, segment contacts into lists, create targeted
personalized email campaigns using journeys, and nurture customers to keep coming
back.
With powerful campaigns analytics in Freshmarketer, you gain insights on opens, clicks,
and responses to improve engagement and generate quality leads for sales teams. Also,
the self-serve landing page builder and native CRO help to accelerate lead generation and
conversion.
If you need to build a better partnership between marketing and sales, Freshsales Suite
provides an all-in-one solution. It brings sales force automation, marketing automation,
chat, and telephony together so that you can organize customer information and
engagement in one central location. Marketing teams better understand who they are
marketing to, and sales teams know who they're selling to.
data.supported_languages: Arabic, Catalan, Czech, Danish, German, English, Estonian, Finnish, French, Hebrew, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Latvian, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Chinese (Simplified)

pricing_plans.plan_description: Perfect for getting started and trying out the marketing platform
Ideal for emerging and established businesses that require multichannel engagement and personalization
plan_features: Send Time Optimisation(STO) by Freddy AI

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Freshmarketer?
The customer scoring feature is most useful for us. Based on the score, important details can be gathered and agents can actively connect with them to increase deals. Moreover, the multi-currency support also helps in effectively closing deals across multiple regions.

What do you dislike about Freshmarketer?
We haven't had any I'll experience yet. We are still exploring and mapping features onto our use case. a walk through blog or guide on benefits of it should also be helpful.

What problems is Freshmarketer solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are a made-to-measure, luxury clothing business with a large international clientele. This platform helps us in running Ad campaigns on our social media platforms and contact premium customers in bulk.

Moreover, the multi-currency support also helps in effectively closing deals across multiple regions.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Freshmarketer solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We are a made-to-measure, luxury clothing business with a large international clientele. This platform helps us in running Ad campaigns on our social media platforms and contact premium customers in bulk.

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent All in One Marketing Tool
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Freshmarketer?
Freshmakers is the choicest software tool for marketers. The dashboard is so impressive that it visualises the marketing analytics and stats. Email marketing is so easy and fun to do in Freshmarketers.

What do you dislike about Freshmarketer?
I have no regrets about working on this tool that comes at a good price.

What problems is Freshmarketer solving and how is that benefiting you?
Being a Sales & Marketing Manager for my Region, Freshmarketer is helping us out with our daily email marketing and push SMS to our Loyalty Members. It offers various advanced features that come in incredible price. Customer support is also remarkable.

initial_reviews.review_title: One of the finest Marketing Tool
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Freshmarketer?
Freshmarketer is the best marketing tool which comes with great features that provides the best marketing & sales analytics support, great branding customisation features, email marketing.

What do you dislike about Freshmarketer?
The customer support response is quite slow. The services are average.

What problems is Freshmarketer solving and how is that benefiting you?
Working on fresh marketers is so easy, the seamless features of building email templates, powerful analytics, content creation and sms push services are just quite excellent. I highly recommend this toll.

initial_reviews.review_title: Freshmarketer: The All-in-One Solution for Conversion Rate Optimization
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Freshmarketer?
Integration with other tools: Freshmarketer integrates seamlessly with other marketing tools, such as CRMs and email marketing platforms, making it easier for my business to manage its marketing efforts.

Powerful analytics: Freshmarketer's features provide valuable insights into user behaviour, allowing my business to make data-driven decisions and optimise marketing campaigns accordingly.

Excellent customer support: Freshmarketer has a helpful customer support team available via chat, email, and phone and is known for being responsive and knowledgeable.

What do you dislike about Freshmarketer?
Pricing can be relatively expensive, especially for smaller businesses or startups.
Customization options can be limited in certain areas.
Occasional bugs or glitches can occur.
There can be a steep learning curve for some users.
Reporting options may be somewhat limited, making it difficult to get a comprehensive view of website performance.

What problems is Freshmarketer solving and how is that benefiting you?
1. Freshmarketer provides various marketing optimisation tools, including A/B testing, heatmaps, and funnel analysis.

2. These tools help businesses understand user behaviour and optimise their website.

3. Freshmarketer's analytics features provide valuable insights into customer behaviour, allowing businesses to make data-driven decisions and improve their marketing campaigns.

4. Using Freshmarketer can improve website performance, increase conversion rates, and optimise marketing efforts for better ROI.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Freshmarketer?
As their tag line "ridiculously easy-to-use" already says everything. I don't feel like adding but I would say, It is damm easy to use it toggle around with this tool. Very responsive Ui and sharp features make it perfect.

What do you dislike about Freshmarketer?
So far so good, I didn't find any reason to hate or dislike this tool. If I had any problems I would enquire with Freshmarketer's support team.

What problems is Freshmarketer solving and how is that benefiting you?
My Client wants to send automated replies to all their travelling customers and those are onboarding the travelling agencies' services. We make it happen with freshmarketer and it feels awsome.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Freshmarketer?
It has user friendly interface for landing page building which allows me to build it without any problem. Very straight forward and powerful tool that helps to make better informed decision using the data it provides.

What do you dislike about Freshmarketer?
Statistical analysis, AB testing, behaviour tracking, heatmaps, funnel analysis could be improved as it lags often which can be fixed. Conversion rate optimization doesn't work at all.

What problems is Freshmarketer solving and how is that benefiting you?
Several apps and functions in one place, cleans up my routine. Very straight forward, effective for onboarding the histogram and funneling tools are excellent. The expense has been more than offset by the value of the A/B test insights.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Freshmarketer?
review_question_answers.answer: It has user friendly interface for landing page building which allows me to build it without any problem. Very straight forward and powerful tool that helps to make better informed decision using the data it provides.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Freshmarketer?
review_question_answers.answer: Statistical analysis, AB testing, behaviour tracking, heatmaps, funnel analysis could be improved as it lags often which can be fixed. Conversion rate optimization doesn't work at all.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Freshmarketer solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Several apps and functions in one place, cleans up my routine. Very straight forward, effective for onboarding the histogram and funneling tools are excellent. The expense has been more than offset by the value of the A/B test insights.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best marketing tool for Mid markets and enterprises
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Freshmarketer?
Freshmarketer helps to gain more context about your leads and deliver personalised and targeted emails that convert better. The overall product also seamlessly integrates sales and marketing

What do you dislike about Freshmarketer?
The UI hangs sometimes, but that recovers quickly. The segmentation capabilities, especially on leads to prospects, can be a little better to allow marketers to filter out the right segments for targetting.

What problems is Freshmarketer solving and how is that benefiting you?
Helping us target our audience footfall better, enabling us to segment our audience in a much more granular fashion, allowing us to create cohorts of segments that marketers use to run campaigns against.

review_question_answers.answer: Helping us target our audience footfall better, enabling us to segment our audience in a much more granular fashion, allowing us to create cohorts of segments that marketers use to run campaigns against.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great for e-commerce and online platforms
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Freshmarketer?
I started using FreshMarketer as part of my freshsales subscription. It has many good options for the websites that generate revenue online such as e-commerce, online booking, platforms etc: you can do A/B testing without any coding skills, generate heatmaps to see the most clicks and engagement and do session replays to see how the real users navigate the website. It is also a good tool to manage DEM and e-mail marketing campaigns, it's easy to segment the leads and import those into the CRM.

What do you dislike about Freshmarketer?
it's a good tool but probably the "contact" section could be improved in order to segment it faster and see the hottest leads and the most engaged visitors or readers of an email.

What problems is Freshmarketer solving and how is that benefiting you?
Good to manage customer journey e-mail campaigns, Freshamarketer has also plenty of fun and well-made templates for e-mails. Re-watching customer sessions of how they actually navigate the website were quite eye-opening for us in some aspects.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Freshmarketer?
review_question_answers.answer: I started using FreshMarketer as part of my freshsales subscription. It has many good options for the websites that generate revenue online such as e-commerce, online booking, platforms etc: you can do A/B testing without any coding skills, generate heatmaps to see the most clicks and engagement and do session replays to see how the real users navigate the website. It is also a good tool to manage DEM and e-mail marketing campaigns, it's easy to segment the leads and import those into the CRM.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Freshmarketer?
review_question_answers.answer: it's a good tool but probably the "contact" section could be improved in order to segment it faster and see the hottest leads and the most engaged visitors or readers of an email.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Freshmarketer solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Good to manage customer journey e-mail campaigns, Freshamarketer has also plenty of fun and well-made templates for e-mails. Re-watching customer sessions of how they actually navigate the website were quite eye-opening for us in some aspects.

What do you dislike about Freshmarketer?
The limited contacts option in the free plan and the lack of integration support with certain third-party applications.

This is our go to marketing automation and helps to manage our entire marketing and email campaigns across our teams.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Freshmarketer?
review_question_answers.answer: So far so good, I didn't find any reason to hate or dislike this tool. If I had any problems I would enquire with Freshmarketer's support team.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Freshmarketer solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: My Client wants to send automated replies to all their travelling customers and those are onboarding the travelling agencies' services. We make it happen with freshmarketer and it feels awsome.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Freshmarketer?
It has user friendly interface for landing page building which allows me to build it without any problem. Very straight forward and powerful tool that helps to make better informed decision using the data it provides.

What do you dislike about Freshmarketer?
Statistical analysis, AB testing, behaviour tracking, heatmaps, funnel analysis could be improved as it lags often which can be fixed. Conversion rate optimization doesn't work at all.

What problems is Freshmarketer solving and how is that benefiting you?
Several apps and functions in one place, cleans up my routine. Very straight forward, effective for onboarding the histogram and funneling tools are excellent. The expense has been more than offset by the value of the A/B test insights.

review_question_answers.answer: Several apps and functions in one place, cleans up my routine. Very straight forward, effective for onboarding the histogram and funneling tools are excellent. The expense has been more than offset by the value of the A/B test insights.

all_reviews.review_title: Best marketing tool for Mid markets and enterprises
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Freshmarketer?
Freshmarketer helps to gain more context about your leads and deliver personalised and targeted emails that convert better. The overall product also seamlessly integrates sales and marketing

What do you dislike about Freshmarketer?
The UI hangs sometimes, but that recovers quickly. The segmentation capabilities, especially on leads to prospects, can be a little better to allow marketers to filter out the right segments for targetting.

What problems is Freshmarketer solving and how is that benefiting you?
Helping us target our audience footfall better, enabling us to segment our audience in a much more granular fashion, allowing us to create cohorts of segments that marketers use to run campaigns against.

review_question_answers.answer: Helping us target our audience footfall better, enabling us to segment our audience in a much more granular fashion, allowing us to create cohorts of segments that marketers use to run campaigns against.

all_reviews.review_content:

The tool is very easy to use and simplifies your email marketing campaigns. It has many other tools such as A/B testing, heatmaps, etc., to see the engagement of the visitors.

What do you dislike about Freshmarketer?
The contact section is limited. The free option provides very few options. The paid services are very expensive.

What problems is Freshmarketer solving and how is that benefiting you?
Needed a bulk emailing tool that would track the open rates and click rates.

all_reviews.review_title: Great for e-commerce and online platforms
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Freshmarketer?
I started using FreshMarketer as part of my freshsales subscription. It has many good options for the websites that generate revenue online such as e-commerce, online booking, platforms etc: you can do A/B testing without any coding skills, generate heatmaps to see the most clicks and engagement and do session replays to see how the real users navigate the website. It is also a good tool to manage DEM and e-mail marketing campaigns, it's easy to segment the leads and import those into the CRM.

What do you dislike about Freshmarketer?
it's a good tool but probably the "contact" section could be improved in order to segment it faster and see the hottest leads and the most engaged visitors or readers of an email.

What problems is Freshmarketer solving and how is that benefiting you?
Good to manage customer journey e-mail campaigns, Freshamarketer has also plenty of fun and well-made templates for e-mails. Re-watching customer sessions of how they actually navigate the website were quite eye-opening for us in some aspects.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Freshmarketer?
review_question_answers.answer: I started using FreshMarketer as part of my freshsales subscription. It has many good options for the websites that generate revenue online such as e-commerce, online booking, platforms etc: you can do A/B testing without any coding skills, generate heatmaps to see the most clicks and engagement and do session replays to see how the real users navigate the website. It is also a good tool to manage DEM and e-mail marketing campaigns, it's easy to segment the leads and import those into the CRM.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Freshmarketer?
review_question_answers.answer: it's a good tool but probably the "contact" section could be improved in order to segment it faster and see the hottest leads and the most engaged visitors or readers of an email.

all_reviews.review_title: One stop solution to manage your marketing campaigns
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Freshmarketer?
The easy implementation and the seamless integration with FreshDesk and FreshSales.

What do you dislike about Freshmarketer?
The limited contacts option in the free plan and the lack of integration support with certain third-party applications.

What problems is Freshmarketer solving and how is that benefiting you?
This is our go to marketing automation and helps to manage our entire marketing and email campaigns across our teams.
